languages.text: "Ты права. Оставайтесь мечом, направленным на врагов".
"You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."
languages.original_text: "Ты права. Оставайтесь мечом, направленным на врагов".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Go forth and remain the sword pointed at enemies."
"You are right. Go forth and remain the sword pointed at enemies."
"You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."
"You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."
"You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."
"You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Je vous brandirai comme une épée contre mes ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Je vous brandirai comme une épée contre mes ennemis. »

languages.text: «Tiene razón. Usaré al culto como espada contra mis enemigos».
languages.original_text: "You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. Usaré al culto como espada contra mis enemigos».

languages.text: “你说得没错，我需要你这把利剑来对付我的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，我需要你这把利剑来对付我的敌人。”

languages.text: 「あなたは正しい。あなたを敵と戦う刀として使おう」
languages.original_text: "You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは正しい。あなたを敵と戦う刀として使おう」

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Ich werde Euch als Schwert gegen meine Feinde einsetzen."
languages.original_text: "You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Ich werde Euch als Schwert gegen meine Feinde einsetzen."

languages.text: "Haklısın. Sizleri düşmanlarıma karşı kılıç olarak kullanacağım."
languages.original_text: "You are right. I will wield you as a sword against my enemies."
